Uses of Class
dkeep.logic.GameState

    • Uses of GameState in dkeep.logic

      Methods in dkeep.logic with parameters of type GameState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Ogre.action(GameState gs)
      Defines what the ogre will do according to its possible coordinates.
      void Hero.action(GameState gs)
      Defines what the hero will do according to level and coordinates.
      void Hero.actionLevel1(GameState gs)
      Defines what the hero will do if playing on the first level.
      void Hero.actionLevel2(GameState gs)
      Defines what the hero will do if playing on the second level.
      void Guard.guard_move_backwards(GameState gs)
      Moves the guard backwards (clock wise) through a predefined path.
      void Guard.guard_move_forward(GameState gs)
      Moves the guard forwards (counter-clock wise) through a predefined path.
      void Guard.guard_move(GameState gs)
      Decides the guard's actions depending on its personality.
      void Hero.heroMove(java.lang.String move, GameState gs)
      Sets the value of the (possible) next X and Y coordinates according to the move argument.
      void Ogre.move(GameState gs)
      Sets the value of the (possible) next X and Y coordinates in a random fashion.
      void Ogre.smash(GameState gs)
      Checks the club's action according to the next possible coordinates.
